Name: DiagramClickedEvent

Parameters.Documentation: The diagram that triggered the event.

Name: DiagramPanChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the pan changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The diagram that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: OldPanX
Parameters.Documentation: The previous pan X offset value in pixels.

Parameters.Name: OldPanY
Parameters.Documentation: The previous pan Y offset value in pixels.

Parameters.Name: PanX
Parameters.Documentation: The new pan X offset value in pixels.

Parameters.Name: PanY
Parameters.Documentation: The new pan Y offset value in pixels.
